# invalidDataFormatSpecified

**Type Property**

An error indicating an invalid data format was specified.

## Declaration

```swift
static var invalidDataFormatSpecified: HMError.Code { get }
```

## Detecting value errors

- **invalidValueType**: An attempt to use an invalid value type.
- **nameContainsProhibitedCharacters**: An attempt to name an object with prohibited characters.
- **nameDoesNotEndWithValidCharacters**: An error indicating the provided name has invalid characters at the end.
- **nameDoesNotStartWithValidCharacters**: An attempt to start the name of an object with invalid characters.
- **stringLongerThanMaximum**: An attempt to use a string longer than the maximum allowed.
- **stringShorterThanMinimum**: An attempt to use a string shorter than the required minimum.
- **valueHigherThanMaximum**: An attempt to use a numeric value higher than the specified maximum value.
- **valueLowerThanMinimum**: An attempt to use a numeric value lower than the specified minimum value.
